title: Oklahoma Film Office Announces Spring Incentives
excerpt: The Oklahoma Film Office has updated incentive guidelines for spring 2025. Here’s what it means for local actors and crew.

title: Spotlight: Tulsa Actor Lands Recurring Role on Streaming Series
excerpt: We chat with a Tulsa-based actor about their journey from community theatre to a recurring role on a major streaming show filming in Oklahoma.

title: Five Oklahoma Productions Wrapping This Quarter
excerpt: A roundup of film and TV projects wrapping in Oklahoma in the next few months—and how to stay on casting radar for the next round.

title: Voice Over in Oklahoma: Who’s Hiring and How to Get Ready
excerpt: Demand for VO talent in Oklahoma is growing. We look at who’s casting and what you need to get started from home.
